title: WTB: These T206's to finish a HOF/Star subset
author: sterlingfox

posts.post_title: WTB: These T206's to finish a HOF/Star subset
posts.post_content:
HOFers
Mathewson White Cap
Cy Young Glove Shows
Hal Chase Trophy
Hal Chase White Cap
Tinker Bat Off
Cobb Bat Off
Cobb Red Port
Cobb Green Port
Walter Johnson Portrait
Crawford with bat

I prefer graded cards, but will consider raw. Lower grades, please (3 and under). Authentic is fine if it presents well.

Please PM or email your scans and pricing to [url]drubitd@gmail.com[/url]
I have a Mathewson White Cap, Piedmont 150, SGC 2.5 if interested

[quote name="greco827" post=1715676]I have a Mathewson White Cap, Piedmont 150, SGC 2.5 if interested[/QUOTE]

PM sent.

Got a few, thanks to the wonderful people on Net54.

Still looking for the others.
Knocked out a few more. Still plenty left to find!
Hal Chase wasn't a HOFer, knock him off your list!

[quote name="pjs3478" post=1757404]Hal Chase wasn't a HOFer, knock him off your list![/QUOTE]

Please re-read the title...

HOF/Star

Chase was most definitely a STAR in his day.

Sterling fox,  

Who are you determining is in your star/hof subset? (I.e. checklist)

Looks like a good group. Good Luck.

[quote name="jasonc" post=1757461]Sterling fox,  

Who are you determining is in your star/hof subset? (I.e. checklist)

Looks like a good group. Good Luck.[/QUOTE]

Jason,

For the purpose of this posting, since Chase is the last non HOFer remaining on my T206 want list, he's the only "Star" in the group - though I should probably add in Dahlen since he's got a good shot of being inducted into the HOF (but I'm keeping him off for now).

Other non HOFers that I've acquired are Cicotte, Gandil and Sleepy Bill Burns due to their involvement in the Black Sox scandal.

I'm sure there are others that can be argued as non HOF "Stars" in the T206 set, but they aren't on my want list.

Good question, by the way!

Down to the last 10 poses to finish! 

Can anyone help? Thanks!
